quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
name: Bob Marley

quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The great advantage about telling the truth is that nobody ever believes it.
name: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
name: Buddha

quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't goin' away.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Half a truth is often a great lie.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: Honesty is more than not lying. It is truth telling, truth speaking, truth living, and truth loving.
name: James E. Faust

quote: The truth is incontrovertible. Malice may attack it, ignorance may deride it, but in the end, there it is.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways, yet each one can be true.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Facts are many, but the truth is one.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The greatest truth is honesty, and the greatest falsehood is dishonesty.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it's for or against.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Morality is the basis of things and truth is the substance of all morality.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There's nothing so kingly as kindness, and nothing so royal as truth.
name: Alice Cary

quote: Honest communication is built on truth and integrity and upon respect of the one for the other.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: People like to say that the conflict is between good and evil. The real conflict is between truth and lies.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: A liar will not be believed, even when he speaks the truth.
name: Aesop

quote: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Truth is powerful and it prevails.
name: Sojourner Truth

quote: It's no wonder that truth is stranger than fiction. Fiction has to make sense.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I never did give anybody hell. I just told the truth and they thought it was hell.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Once you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, no matter how improbable, must be the truth.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I was born into the world as the king of truth for the salvation of the world.
name: Buddha

quote: Even if you are a minority of one, the truth is the truth.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
name: Unknown

quote: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The truth is that all men having power ought to be mistrusted.
name: James Madison

quote: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time.
name: Gerald R. Ford

quote: A lie told often enough becomes the truth.
name: Vladimir Lenin

quote: There is no truth. There is only perception.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Any truth is better than indefinite doubt.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Truth is the daughter of time, not of authority.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Truth will ultimately prevail where there is pains to bring it to light.
name: George Washington

quote: Perhaps the truth depends on a walk around the lake.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
name: Galileo Galilei

quote: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
name: Arthur Miller

quote: The thing about the truth is, not a lot of people can handle it.
name: Conor McGregor

quote: A lie which is half a truth is ever the blackest of lies.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: That which is false troubles the heart, but truth brings joyous tranquillity.
name: Rumi

quote: After all, the ultimate goal of all research is not objectivity, but truth.
name: Helene Deutsch

quote: It's in literature that true life can be found. It's under the mask of fiction that you can tell the truth.
name: Gao Xingjian

quote: There is nothing so strong or safe in an emergency of life as the simple truth.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Truth stands, even if there be no public support. It is self-sustained.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: 'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.
name: John Keats

quote: Truth is the ultimate power. When the truth comes around, all the lies have to run and hide.
name: Ice Cube

quote: I trust you: That's huge. That's truth. That's real love. Everyone uses 'I love you' so loosely.
name: Justin Chatwin

quote: Truth is the torch that gleams through the fog without dispelling it.
name: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quote: The poet is a liar who always speaks the truth.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Photography is truth. The cinema is truth twenty-four times per second.
name: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: The very concept of objective truth is fading out of the world. Lies will pass into history.
name: George Orwell

quote: Convictions are more dangerous foes of truth than lies.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A lot of truth is said in jest.
name: Eminem

quote: I think the truth is black-and-white.
name: Nancy Grace

quote: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
name: Buddha

quote: Truth is the daughter of time, and I feel no shame in being her midwife.
name: Johannes Kepler

quote: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
name: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: A few observation and much reasoning lead to error; many observations and a little reasoning to truth.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: Truth will rise above falsehood as oil above water.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Truth is confirmed by inspection and delay; falsehood by haste and uncertainty.
name: Tacitus

quote: Stop holding your truth; speak your truth. Be yourself. It's the healthiest way to be.
name: Tiffany Haddish

quote: Fiction is the truth inside the lie.
name: Stephen King

quote: We too often bind ourselves by authorities rather than by the truth.
name: Lucretia Mott

quote: There's just some magic in truth and honesty and openness.
name: Frank Ocean

quote: I chose to pursue a career in physics because there the truth isn't so easily bent.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: The only passion that guides me is for the truth... I look at everything from this point of view.
name: Che Guevara

quote: You shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you mad.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: When truth has no burning, then it is philosophy, when it gets burning from the heart, it becomes poetry.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Humanity appreciates truth about as much as a squirrel appreciates silver.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Let's not be afraid to speak the common sense truth: you can't have high standards without good discipline.
name: William Hague

quote: Truth is on the side of the oppressed.
name: Malcolm X

quote: The bud of victory is always in the truth.
name: Benjamin Harrison

quote: The universe is transformation: life is opinion.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: There are sadistic scientists who hurry to hunt down errors instead of establishing the truth.
name: Marie Curie

quote: In time of war, truth is always replaced by propaganda.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Accusations fit on a bumper sticker; the truth takes longer.
name: Michael Hayden

quote: The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: If you are out to describe the truth, leave elegance to the tailor.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Plato is my friend; Aristotle is my friend, but my greatest friend is truth.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: The theatre was created to tell people the truth about life and the social situation.
name: Stella Adler

quote: There's a world of difference between truth and facts. Facts can obscure the truth.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: When you want to fool the world, tell the truth.
name: Otto von Bismarck

quote: It takes two to speak the truth: one to speak, and another to hear.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A harmful truth is better than a useful lie.
name: Thomas Mann

quote: My way of joking is to tell the truth. That's the funniest joke in the world.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you want to be thought a liar, always tell the truth.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: The truth is, your identity already has been stolen.
name: Frank Abagnale

quote: The truth is that men are tired of liberty.
name: Benito Mussolini

quote: When truth is on your side, you don't need support.
name: Hrithik Roshan

quote: Truth is a hard deer to hunt. If you eat too much truth at once, you may die of the truth.
name: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: Non-violence and truth are inseparable and presuppose one another.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In seeking truth you have to get both sides of a story.
name: Walter Cronkite

quote: Truth is certainly a branch of morality and a very important one to society.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: In wartime, truth is so precious that she should always be attended by a bodyguard of lies.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: If you shut the door to all errors, truth will be shut out.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I tore myself away from the safe comfort of certainties through my love for truth - and truth rewarded me.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The lawyer's truth is not Truth, but consistency or a consistent expediency.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The words of truth are always paradoxical.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: The truth is of course is that there is no journey. We are arriving and departing all at the same time.
name: David Bowie

quote: Tell the children the truth.
name: Bob Marley

quote: It does not require many words to speak the truth.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Truth is a point of view, but authenticity can't be faked.
name: Peter Guber

quote: Justice is truth in action.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: God's truth judges created things out of love, and Satan's truth judges them out of envy and hatred.
name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Everything takes me longer than I expect. It's the sad truth about life.
name: Donna Tartt

quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.
name: Herman Melville

quote: Real intimacy depends on truth - lovingly told - especially in the bedroom.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: Whoever is detected in a shameful fraud is ever after not believed even if they speak the truth.
name: Phaedrus

quote: A Lawyer will do anything to win a case, sometimes he will even tell the truth.
name: Patrick Murray

quote: A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
name: William Blake

quote: If uncovering the truth is the greatest challenge of nonfiction writing, it is also the greatest reward.
name: Candice Millard

quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
name: John Locke

quote: The People have a right to the Truth as they have a right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.
name: Frank Norris

quote: Truth is always served by great minds, even if they fight it.
name: Jean Rostand

quote: We cannot forever hide the truth about ourselves, from ourselves.
name: John McCain

quote: It is by doubting that we come to investigate, and by investigating that we recognize the truth.
name: Peter Abelard

quote: When in doubt tell the truth.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Reason is the natural order of truth; but imagination is the organ of meaning.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: The object of the superior man is truth.
name: Confucius

quote: Man will occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of the time he will pick himself up and continue on.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: We swallow greedily any lie that flatters us, but we sip only little by little at a truth we find bitter.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: Whatever satisfies the soul is truth.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Truth never damages a cause that is just.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Rebellion without truth is like spring in a bleak, arid desert.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: It's very easy to be judgmental until you know someone's truth.
name: Kate Winslet

quote: Facts are stubborn things.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Plato is dear to me, but dearer still is truth.
name: Aristotle

quote: Only enemies speak the truth; friends and lovers lie endlessly, caught in the web of duty.
name: Stephen King

quote: Once you go inside and weed through the muck, you will find the real beauty, the truth about yourself.
name: Lindsay Wagner

quote: I am a humble but very earnest seeker after truth.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
name: Alan Watts

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and must therefore be treated with great caution.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Acting is all about finding the truth within whatever world you're in.
name: Karen Gillan

quote: And, after all, what is a lie? 'Tis but the truth in a masquerade.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Many a doctrine is like a window pane. We see truth through it but it divides us from truth.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Why would anyone lie? The truth is always more colorful.
name: James Hall

quote: To the living we owe respect, but to the dead we owe only the truth.
name: Voltaire

quote: The truth is found when men are free to pursue it.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: How sweet the words of Truth, breathed from the lips of Love.
name: James Beattie

quote: Dear Internet: You are very good at spreading rumors. Truth is more valuable and much harder to come by.
name: Mark Frost

quote: Legends die hard. They survive as truth rarely does.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Always speak the truth, think before you speak, and write it down afterwards.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: To be outspoken is easy when you do not wait to speak the complete truth.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: You don't have to sort of enhance reality. There is nothing stranger than truth.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: It is one thing to show a man that he is in an error, and another to put him in possession of the truth.
name: John Locke

quote: Everything will line up perfectly when knowing and living the truth becomes more important than looking good.
name: Alan Cohen

quote: Architecture is the reaching out for the truth.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: This is the way of peace: Overcome evil with good, falsehood with truth, and hatred with love.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: The truth is the best picture, the best propaganda.
name: Robert Capa

quote: Truth springs from argument amongst friends.
name: David Hume

quote: Not everyone can see the truth, but he can be it.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: Truth sits upon the lips of dying men.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: Let us hold our discussion together in our own persons, making trial of the truth and of ourselves.
name: Protagoras

quote: The truth is that life is delicious, horrible, charming, frightful, sweet, bitter, and that is everything.
name: Anatole France

quote: Be truthful, nature only sides with truth.
name: Adolf Loos

quote: Truth is mighty and will prevail. There is nothing wrong with this, except that it ain't so.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities. Truth isn't.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Truth is the most valuable thing we have. Let us economize it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Our democracy is designed to speak truth to power.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: Peace if possible, truth at all costs.
name: Martin Luther

quote: I am certain of nothing but the holiness of the heart's affections, and the truth of imagination.
name: John Keats

quote: Fiction reveals truth that reality obscures.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Truth is the property of no individual but is the treasure of all men.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: All truth is simple... is that not doubly a lie?
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Truth is beautiful, without doubt; but so are lies.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousandfold.
name: Aristotle

quote: One may sometimes tell a lie, but the grimace that accompanies it tells the truth.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Every mind must make its choice between truth and repose. It cannot have both.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Piety requires us to honor truth above our friends.
name: Aristotle

quote: By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth.
name: George Carlin

quote: I believe in the fundamental truth of all great religions of the world.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Mystical explanations are thought to be deep; the truth is that they are not even shallow.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is not a truth existing which I fear... or would wish unknown to the whole world.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Every truth has two sides; it is as well to look at both, before we commit ourselves to either.
name: Aesop

quote: I guess rumors are more exciting than the truth.
name: Venus Williams

quote: By doubting we are led to question, by questioning we arrive at the truth.
name: Peter Abelard

quote: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: There are some people so addicted to exaggeration that they can't tell the truth without lying.
name: Josh Billings

quote: All great truths begin as blasphemies.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: All the truth in the world adds up to one big lie.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Nothing gives rest but the sincere search for truth.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: It's always good news when you're closer to the truth.
name: Fabiola Gianotti

quote: Intense feeling too often obscures the truth.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: Truth is always strange, stranger than fiction.
name: Lord Byron

quote: It is the nature of truth in general, as of some ores in particular, to be richest when most superficial.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The absurd is the essential concept and the first truth.
name: Albert Camus

quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Truth is the glue that holds government together.
name: Gerald R. Ford

quote: Truth never pleads or compromises or wavers. It invites and awaits your acceptance.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: I'm not a tough guy. I'm just delivering the truth and only the truth and if you can't deal with it, too bad.
name: Kevin O'Leary

quote: The most powerful element in advertising is the truth.
name: William Bernbach

quote: Time is money says the proverb, but turn it around and you get a precious truth. Money is time.
name: George Gissing

quote: Truth is so hard to tell, it sometimes needs fiction to make it plausible.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Truth emerges more readily from error than from confusion.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: You will find truth more quickly through delight than gravity. Let out a little more string on your kite.
name: Alan Cohen

quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: A writer should have this little voice inside of you saying, Tell the truth. Reveal a few secrets here.
name: Quentin Tarantino

quote: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.
name: John Keats

quote: A lie would have no sense unless the truth were felt dangerous.
name: Alfred Adler

quote: If there were only one truth, you couldn't paint a hundred canvases on the same theme.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: If the Republicans will stop telling lies about the Democrats, we will stop telling the truth about them.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: The first casualty when war comes is truth.
name: Hiram Johnson

quote: I think all good reporting is the same thing - the best attainable version of the truth.
name: Carl Bernstein

quote: When truth takes a backseat to ego and politics, trust is lost.
name: Patrick Lencioni

quote: Tell the truth, but tell it slant.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: The first reaction to truth is hatred.
name: Tertullian

quote: Children say that people are hung sometimes for speaking the truth.
name: Joan of Arc

quote: Seeing the bigger picture opens your eyes to what is the truth.
name: Wadada Leo Smith

quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
name: Leonard Cohen

quote: I've been called a recluse. There's definitely truth in that. I like to spend time alone.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: There is nothing so powerful as truth, and often nothing so strange.
name: Daniel Webster

quote: Truth is a thing immortal and perpetual, and it gives to us a beauty that fades not away in time.
name: Frank Norris

quote: Life is about, every single day, getting up to manifest your truth.
name: Cory Booker

quote: Myths and creeds are heroic struggles to comprehend the truth in the world.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: I am bound to tell what I am told, but not in every case to believe it.
name: Herodotus

quote: Never question the relevance of truth, but always question the truth of relevance.
name: Craig Bruce

quote: When I saw corruption, I was forced to find truth on my own. I couldn't swallow the hypocrisy.
name: Barry White

quote: Truth is, I love to play bartender and assist my husband at the BBQ.
name: Sherry Yard

quote: Truth in philosophy means that concept and external reality correspond.
name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Silence is the mother of truth.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Respect for the truth comes close to being the basis for all morality.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
name: Giordano Bruno

quote: Tests that sugar-coat the truth only set up our kids to fail in worse ways down the road.
name: Wendy Kopp

quote: Nobody speaks the truth when there is something they must have.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: I'm not that interested in recreating reality. I'm interested in recreating an emotional truth.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: My longing for truth was a single prayer.
name: Edith Stein

quote: Truth exists; only lies are invented.
name: Georges Braque

quote: The truth is, there is no link between vaccines and autism. Vaccines are incredibly important.
name: Timothy Simons

quote: The truth is always more heroic than the hype.
name: Jessica Lynch

quote: The Way is the beginning of the ten thousand things and the guiding thread of truth and falsity.
name: Han Fei

quote: Only the broken-hearted know the truth about love.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Truth is a tendency.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Read nature; nature is a friend to truth.
name: Edward Young

quote: My religion is based on truth and non-violence. Truth is my God. Non-violence is the means of realising Him.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is another old poet whose name I do not now remember who said, 'Truth is the daughter of Time.'
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Why shouldn't truth be stranger than fiction? Fiction, after all, has to make sense.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Truth is so rare that it is delightful to tell it.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: All credibility, all good conscience, all evidence of truth come only from the senses.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We have art in order not to die of the truth.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Truth is handsomer than the affectation of love. Your goodness must have some edge to it, else it is none.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: For though we love both the truth and our friends, piety requires us to honor the truth first.
name: Aristotle

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Adversity is the first path to truth.
name: Lord Byron

quote: The truth is, no one of us can be free until everybody is free.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Truth, like light, blinds. Falsehood, on the contrary, is a beautiful twilight that enhances every object.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The pursuit of truth does not permit violence on one's opponent.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Mythology is a subjective truth. Every culture imagines life a certain way.
name: Devdutt Pattanaik

quote: Not when truth is dirty, but when it is shallow, does the enlightened man dislike to wade into its waters.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The rarest quality in an epitaph is truth.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: No face which we can give to a matter will stead us so well at last as the truth. This alone wears well.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: God, as Truth, has been for me a treasure beyond price. May He be so to every one of us.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I value unity because I believe we learn truth from each other in this process.
name: Rowan Williams

quote: Truth, like gold, is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Somebody said I am the most popular person in Arizona because I am speaking the truth.
name: Donald Trump

quote: The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
name: Shana Alexander

quote: Who never doubted, never half believed. Where doubt is, there truth is - it is her shadow.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: He who knows nothing is closer to the truth than he whose mind is filled with falsehoods and errors.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Memory is a complicated thing, a relative to truth, but not its twin.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: It is error alone which needs the support of government. Truth can stand by itself.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It's been a pretty fun ride, to tell you the truth.
name: R. Lee Ermey

quote: Poetry is nearer to vital truth than history.
name: Plato

quote: Not being known doesn't stop the truth from being true.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Exaggeration is truth that has lost its temper.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Truth is the beginning of every good to the gods, and of every good to man.
name: Plato

quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Let us be a little humble; let us think that the truth may not perhaps be entirely with us.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Art is a lie that makes us realize truth.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Beyond a doubt truth bears the same relation to falsehood as light to darkness.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Say not, 'I have found the truth,' but rather, 'I have found a truth.'
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Never wear your best trousers when you go out to fight for freedom and truth.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: If now isn't a good time for the truth I don't see when we'll get to it.
name: Nikki Giovanni

quote: I think that all things, in their way, reflect heavenly truth, the imagination not least.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: People will generally accept facts as truth only if the facts agree with what they already believe.
name: Andy Rooney

quote: Three chords and the truth - that's what a country song is.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: It is error only, and not truth, that shrinks from inquiry.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Personality is only ripe when a man has made the truth his own.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: When a truth is not given complete freedom, freedom is not complete.
name: Vaclav Havel

quote: The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
name: William Temple

quote: If you ever injected truth into politics you have no politics.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Truth comes out in wine.
name: Pliny the Elder

quote: In everything truth surpasses the imitation and copy.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Nature has planted in our minds an insatiable longing to see the truth.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The truth is, hardly any of us have ethical energy enough for more than one really inflexible point of honor.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Pain reaches the heart with electrical speed, but truth moves to the heart as slowly as a glacier.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: I am very fond of truth, but not at all of martyrdom.
name: Voltaire

quote: I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Truth made you a traitor as it often does in a time of scoundrels.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The truth of things is the chief nutriment of superior intellects.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: For a creative writer possession of the 'truth' is less important than emotional sincerity.
name: George Orwell

quote: Tragedy is like strong acid - it dissolves away all but the very gold of truth.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The truth is, I've been the Hulk my whole life.
name: Lou Ferrigno

quote: Everything you add to the truth subtracts from the truth.
name: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: Love is not a mere impulse, it must contain truth, which is law.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The world is indeed a mixture of truth and make-believe. Discard the make-believe and take the truth.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: The antiquity and general acceptance of an opinion is not assurance of its truth.
name: Pierre Bayle

quote: There are two ways of lying. One, not telling the truth and the other, making up statistics.
name: Josefina Vazquez Mota

quote: Attempting to get at truth means rejecting stereotypes and cliches.
name: Harold Evans

quote: A remark generally hurts in proportion to its truth.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Hope is nature's veil for hiding truth's nakedness.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: A caricature is putting the face of a joke on the body of a truth.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: We often want one thing and pray for another, not telling the truth even to the gods.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Bigotry tries to keep truth safe in its hand with a grip that kills it.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The pillars of truth and the pillars of freedom - they are the pillars of society.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: The truth is that entrepreneurship is more like a roller coaster ride than a cruise.
name: Vivek Wadhwa

quote: What this means is that we shouldn't abbreviate the truth but rather get a new method of presentation.
name: Edward Tufte

quote: If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Art is not a study of positive reality, it is the seeking for ideal truth.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Truth is weirder than any fiction I've seen.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: In truth, I did enjoy the benefits of a Harvard connection.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: We know the truth, not only by the reason, but also by the heart.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: You must accept the truth from whatever source it comes.
name: Maimonides

quote: The truth is that many people set rules to keep from making decisions.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: The truth is more important than the facts.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Truth uncompromisingly told will always have its ragged edges.
name: Herman Melville

quote: Uniform ideas originating among entire peoples unknown to each other must have a common ground of truth.
name: Giambattista Vico

quote: Most jokes state a bitter truth.
name: Larry Gelbart

quote: Truth is not only violated by falsehood; it may be equally outraged by silence.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: They whom truth and wisdom lead, can gather honey from a weed.
name: William Cowper

quote: Truth is strong, and sometime or other will prevail.
name: Mary Astell

quote: It is difficult to separate, at times, the myth from the truth.
name: Bob Kane

quote: Actually being funny is mostly telling the truth about things.
name: Bernard Sahlins

quote: The search for the truth is the most important work in the whole world, and the most dangerous.
name: James Clavell

quote: Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it.
name: Andre Gide

quote: No one can look back on his schooldays and say with truth that they were altogether unhappy.
name: George Orwell

quote: I don't believe it. Prove it to me and I still won't believe it.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: I am not afraid of the pen, or the scaffold, or the sword. I will tell the truth wherever I please.
name: Mary Harris Jones

quote: I really think that people never go wrong by telling the truth.
name: Sydney Pollack

quote: The stupid believe that to be truthful is easy; only the artist, the great artist, knows how difficult it is.
name: Willa Cather

quote: Sometimes the truth hurts. And sometimes it feels real good.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Heresies are experiments in man's unsatisfied search for truth.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Truth forever on the scaffold, wrong forever on the throne.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: So near is falsehood to truth that a wise man would do well not to trust himself on the narrow edge.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Sometimes I dread the truth of the lines I say. But the dread must never show.
name: Vivien Leigh

quote: My mother taught me that when you stand in the truth and someone tells a lie about you, don't fight it.
name: Whitney Houston

quote: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: The pursuit of truth will set you free; even if you never catch up with it.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: From principles is derived probability, but truth or certainty is obtained only from facts.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: Dispassionate objectivity is itself a passion, for the real and for the truth.
name: Abraham Maslow

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow.
name: Emile Zola

quote: Fixed principles of truth are the only safeguard for youth.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Truth is a great flirt.
name: Franz Liszt

quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.
name: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: We must never be afraid to go too far, for truth lies beyond.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: A word of truth can mobilise two peoples looking for the road to reconciliation.
name: Donald Tusk

quote: Sincerity is moral truth.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: Be influenced by nothing but your clients' interests. Tell them the truth.
name: Arthur C. Nielsen

quote: The best mind-altering drug is the truth.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: Live truth instead of professing it.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: If any man seeks for greatness, let him forget greatness and ask for truth, and he will find both.
name: Horace Mann

quote: I never apologize for the truth. And the truth here is that racists come in many different colors.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: Gossip needn't be false to be evil - there's a lot of truth that shouldn't be passed around.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: If an eloquent speaker speak not the truth, is there a more horrid kind of object in creation?
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: A play is fiction - and fiction is fact distilled into truth.
name: Edward Albee

quote: One must be very particular about telling the truth. Through truth one can realize God.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: Falsehood is cowardice, the truth courage.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: To tell the truth is revolutionary.
name: Antonio Gramsci

quote: No matter how difficult and painful it may be, nothing sounds as good to the soul as the truth.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Virtue is the fount whence honour springs.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Gossip is called gossip because it's not always the truth.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: Our cause is just, and the might of Korea that is united with truth is infinite.
name: Kim Jong-un

quote: Luckily, even when people are shouting lies, the truth is undamaged. Science doesn't matter what you believe.
name: Ricky Gervais

quote: The public will believe anything, so long as it is not founded on truth.
name: Edith Sitwell

quote: Science is the ultimate tool to reveal the laws of nature, and the one word written on its banner is Truth.
name: Dan Shechtman

quote: What ever truth drops on it eventually grinds to a powder.
name: Art Blakey

quote: It's a lot easier to tell the truth usually.
name: Elliott Smith

quote: Doubt is the incentive to truth and inquiry leads the way.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: If history and science have taught us anything, it is that passion and desire are not the same as truth.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: Unfortunately, writing and reporting the truth is not allowed under Castro's tyrannical dictatorship.
name: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quote: Poets are all who love, who feel great truths, And tell them; and the truth of truths is love.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: Any necessary truth, whether a priori or a posteriori, could not have turned out otherwise.
name: Saul Kripke

quote: In a memoir, your main contract with the reader is to tell the truth, no matter how bizarre.
name: Edmund White

quote: Eternal truth, eternal righteousness, eternal love; these only can triumph, for these only can endure.
name: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: As soon as you think you know someone else's truth better than they do, you are in deep water.
name: Martha Beck

quote: From the death of the old the new proceeds, and the life of truth from the death of creeds.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: We don't have truth delivered to us very often, especially in this very commercialized world.
name: Hal Holbrook

quote: Fiction is a lie that is told in the service of truth.
name: Tim O'Brien

quote: Light is the symbol of truth.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: The greatest homage we can pay to truth, is to use it.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: I can't work completely out of my imagination. I must put my foot in a bit of truth; and then I can fly free.
name: Andrew Wyeth

quote: The truth needs so little rehearsal.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Truth gets well if she is run over by a locomotive, while error dies of lockjaw if she scratches her finger.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: Truth is stranger than fiction; fiction has to make sense.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: I would rather be uncomfortable with the truth than to be lied to in comfort. That's just my nature.
name: Jesse Ventura

quote: I always say your truth is your compass to your purpose.
name: Amanda Seales

quote: When a woman tells the truth she is creating the possibility for more truth around her.
name: Adrienne Rich

quote: False history gets made all day, any day, the truth of the new is never on the news.
name: Adrienne Rich

quote: Comedy has to be based on truth. You take the truth and you put a little curlicue at the end.
name: Sid Caesar

quote: That's the nice thing about the field of science - the test of time sorts out the truth.
name: Craig Venter

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
name: Dick Clark

quote: The only thing I can do is tell the truth as I see it and let the chips fall where they may.
name: Jack Kemp

quote: The truth is that from birth on we are, to one extent or another, a fairly sensual species.
name: Jock Sturges

quote: My personal conviction is that science is concerned wholly with truth, not with ethics.
name: Arthur Keith

quote: The intuition of free will gives us the truth.
name: Corliss Lamont

quote: We live in a world of denial, and we don't know what the truth is anymore.
name: Javier Bardem

quote: The truth is I quite like to dress in jeans and a woolly jumper.
name: Mireille Enos

quote: Truth never changes. Truth always sets people free.
name: Cynthia Robinson

quote: The most important thing about my profession is finding the truth, finding the reality of these shows.
name: Shuler Hensley

quote: Whatever has happened in my quest for innovation has been part of my quest for immaculate reality.
name: George Lucas

quote: Learn what is true in order to do what is right.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Infinite love is the only truth. Everything else is illusion.
name: David Icke

quote: There are certain persons for whom pure Truth is a poison.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Truth makes on the ocean of nature no one track of light; every eye, looking on, finds its own.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: No one ever tells us the truth, even those we love.
name: Anna Held

quote: Not truth, but faith, it is that keeps the world alive.
name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: To be a writer does not mean to preach a truth, it means to discover a truth.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: Cynicism is an unpleasant way of saying the truth.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: Truth is immortal; error is mortal.
name: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: The truth always finds it's way out, even years and years and years later. The truth always prevails.
name: Tyler Hamilton

quote: Truth disappears with the telling of it.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Evil is the interruption of a truth by the pressure of particular or individual interests.
name: Alain Badiou

quote: Sure I think it is healthy to speak the truth, and be who you are, and be proud of that.
name: Nathan Lane

quote: The truth is, I've been lucky. But just like the waltz, life has its own rhythm of rise and fall.
name: Len Goodman

quote: I always felt that a scientist owes the world only one thing, and that is the truth as he sees it.
name: Hans Eysenck

quote: The only people I have seen who have been truly pushing for the truth are the family members.
name: Sibel Edmonds

quote: Truth knows no color; it appeals to intelligence.
name: James Hal Cone
